name: Trending News Reaction Template
description: Template for reacting to trending news or viral topics with personal commentary
template: Everyone's talking about {trending_topic}, but here's what they're not telling you. {context_summary}. Now, here's my take: {personal_opinion}. The reason this matters is {significance}. What I find most interesting is {unique_angle}. But here's what I think will happen next: {prediction}. {supporting_evidence}. What's your take on this? Are you {reaction_option_1} or {reaction_option_2}? Let me know below!

variables.name: trending_topic
variables.description: The trending news, event, or viral topic being discussed

variables.name: context_summary
variables.description: Brief summary of what happened or the current situation

variables.name: personal_opinion
variables.description: Your personal take or opinion on the topic

variables.name: significance
variables.description: Why this topic is important or relevant

variables.name: unique_angle
variables.description: An interesting perspective or detail others might have missed

variables.name: prediction
variables.description: Your prediction about what will happen next

variables.name: supporting_evidence
variables.description: Evidence or reasoning supporting your prediction
variables.defaultValue: Based on similar situations in the past

variables.name: reaction_option_1
variables.description: First reaction option for audience engagement

variables.name: reaction_option_2
variables.description: Second reaction option for audience engagement

hooks.text: Everyone's talking about {trending_topic}, but here's what they're not telling you
But here's what I think will happen next
What's your take on this? Are you {reaction_option_1} or {reaction_option_2}?
